name: Fortune-Preserving Talisman
description:
After your character uses a Skill: If that character does not have full HP, heal that character for 2 HP.
Usage(s): 3
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After your character uses a Skill: </color>If that character does not have full HP, heal that character for 2 HP.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K3]: 3</color>
